/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a serene blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. 

On either side of the street, modern buildings rise, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the world around them. These structures are interspersed with trees, their leaves a vibrant green, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars and buses, painted in various colors, line the road, ready to whisk their passengers to their destinations. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day under the watchful eyes of the towering buildings.

The image is taken from a high vantage point, offering a bird's eye view of the scene. This perspective allows for a comprehensive view of the street, the buildings, and the people, providing a glimpse into the rhythm of city life.
